snippet: Mr. Dobriansky studied chemistry and worked at Schrafft’s before he found his vocal vocation.
abstract: Andrij Dobriansky, bass who sang more than 900 performances with the Metropolitan Opera, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Dobriansky studied chemistry and worked at Schrafft’s before he found his vocal vocation.

headline.seo: Andrij Dobriansky Dies at 81; Sang More Than 900 Met Roles
headline.main: Andrij Dobriansky Dies at 81; Sang at the Met More Than 900 Times
headline.print_headline: Andrij Dobriansky, 81, Who Sang At the Met More Than 900 Times
